title: Level up rewards for new players
body:
Basically levelling up is a pain and so is farming IP, ESPECIALLY for new players.

What do you think of level up rewards every 5 or 10 levels? E.g.
Level 5 - free 450 ip champion
Level 10 - free 1350 ip champion
Level 15 - free 3150 ip champion
level 20 - free 4800 ip champion
level 25 - free 6300 ip champion
level 30 - third rune page

Obviously these could be tweaked or something, but I think this would help new players out a lot.

replies.body:
Very useful, rito hire this man/woman.

EDIT: Then again, smurfing would be easier so...

Not really, you get 5 champs and a rune page, of which the 5 champs (i assume) would be random, meaning probably not the ones you would pick.

The hardest part about smurfing is leveling the account.
With the new patch, leveling it will be significantly easier.
I don't think they would give you an actual champion maybe only a 450 champion but not the others. I think that if they were to implement this they would just give ip.

Bump?
Am I allowed to do this? Does this do anything?
they are already doing something for new people. They are apparently cutting the time from level 0-30 in half.

It's still a pain in the ass to level to 30 though and you don't exactly get showered with IP on the way. I'm sure you could do some calculations or something and find that you don't get enough for a 6300 ip champion for quite a while. That the fact that pre-20 runes are shit doesn't help, even if they are cheaper.
I like this idea, combined with the half leveling time, would make newer players and smurfs lives that tiny bit easier

i prefer if they would give new player lvl 1 runes as reward
not only it help (a little bit...) during early level
it would also help new player get an idea of how the rune system works ect

I like this idea I think the way they would tweak it they would make it random 450 IP champion ect. I feel this would be better on roits part as they still help the community and then also don't make it so easy that you still have to work for that one champion you want, and the "random" champion being stronger than most (usually) is ment to help you learn the game and grow as you use harder and more mechanical champions before you start the beast we called ranked.
